short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes the content of the Reddit homepage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Spend too much time browsing reddit? 

Want to gain your productive time back?

Install this extension and remove the content on every page of Reddit. This extension will remove Reddit's feed on the main page and every subpage, so you can stop being distracted and gain back your time. That's it.

No content = no distraction = stop wasting time on Reddit.

Enjoy your Reddit free productivity! :)
